40828.name: Percentage of teachers in lower secondary education who are trained, both sexes (%)
40828.description: Number of teachers who have received the minimum organized teacher training (pre-service or in-service) required for teaching at the lower secondary level in the given country, expressed as a percentage of the total number of teachers at the lower secondary level.
